citations.narrative:
There were four dogs noted during inspection to have excessively long toenails:
- White Female Bichon #8933
- Red Female Cavalier King Charles Spaniel #3073
- Black and Tan Female Yorkie #6202
- White and Grey Female Shih Tzu #2384
Long toenails are problematic because they can be easily broken. Long toenails may also cause abnormal ambulation
and can lead to early arthritic changes in the toes. The licensee must ensure that preventative care such as properly
trimmed toenails be performed on a regular basis and as often as necessary to avoid overgrowth and any subsequent
injuries. Correct from November 5, 2023, onward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(4) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
There were four dogs noted during inspection to have excessively long toenails:  
 
- White Female Bichon #8933 
- Red Female Cavalier King Charles Spaniel #3073 
- Black and Tan Female Yorkie #6202 
- White and Grey Female Shih Tzu #2384 
 
Long toenails are problematic because they can be easily broken. Long toenails may also cause abnormal ambulation 
and can lead to early arthritic changes in the toes. The licensee must ensure that preventative care such as properly 
trimmed toenails be performed on a regular basis and as often as necessary to avoid overgrowth and any subsequent 
injuries. Correct from November 5, 2023, onward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
